tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    speed INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    speed INT)

CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (
  camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_signals (
  signal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_congestion (
  congestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  level INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
